      • normalizeRoleName

        private static java.lang.String normalizeRoleName(java.lang.String role)
        Convert Argument_CU and Related_to_CU to Argument and Related_to. This will not be necessary in the future when the data will be post-processed to remove _CU suffixes. Currently mipacq data does not have the suffixes and sharp data does.
